vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to lift up, swell, be lifted up
1a) (Pual) to swell
1b) (Hiphil) to be bold, be swelled

1a) (Pual) to swell
1b) (Hiphil) to be bold, be swelled

2) (Hiphil) 輕率疏忽 #民 14:44|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
